name: Vicente D. Rubi
description: '''Vicente Daclan Rubi''' (January 23, 1903 â€“ November 12, 1980) was a [[Filipinos|Filipino]] [[Visayans|Visayan]] musician from [[Cebu]], [[Philippines]], best known for composing the Philippine [[Christmas carol]] ''[[Kasadya Ning Taknaa|Kasadyaa Ning Taknaa]]'', which was translated into Tagalog, ''[[Ang pasko ay sumapit|Ang Pasko ay Sumapit]],'' by National Artist [[Levi Celerio]]. He was one of the top 100 Cebuano personalities according to [[The Freeman (newspaper)|The Freeman]].
